TopicTitle: Nuka Corp shuttle project ( and apparently other stuff :D )

Articles.Content:
IMO the texture needs more variation in it. Platelines, burn streaks, signs of having been used, etc. And the hex pattern is a bit too strong too. I don't have any similar spacecraft myself, so an aircraft will have to do to show what I mean:

*That thing is years old.

Well anariq, why does this shuttle have to have a conventional shuttle launch system? The profile of the shuttle lends itself to a much more simple system. Your scales are quickly getting out of control, and I fear that the shuttle would be hell to balance if an asymmetric system is used.

Was thinking on SSTO but find the buran/energia intriguing, and find it perfect to this shuttle, it dos not have fuel enough in it self to get it into LEO. Though if no cargo it should be able to do it.

Uterly freaking beautifull work and mimicing the work done at the moment with lifting bodies, a massive welldone (or atleast when its released). May I offer a suggestion, as you have detailed your work with shuttles and pods would it not be prudent to round out the Nuka Corp line of products with rocket systems and station parts?

Thanks! yes is thinking on making some rocket parts that is more smooth than vanilla parts. And start to make 4 meters wide space station parts. Something that this shuttle is made for.

IMO the texture needs more variation in it. Platelines, burn streaks, signs of having been used, etc. And the hex pattern is a bit too strong too. I don't have any similar spacecraft myself, so an aircraft will have to do to show what I mean:

Is planning for the burn streaks on the shields, But It will have so uniform look. Like Buran/shuttle it will be really uniform with its ceramic tiles. BTW really like that model.

Still modelling the tank.

Just keep the humour in the project, as your a Dane, remember that KSP is what Lego Batman is to Arkham Assylum. Its the NASA bobblehead.
What I meant with my previous comment is why not put your shuttle ON TOP of a rocket, like normal?

How many shuttle type space planes actually fly on top of a rocket? The only one I know of is the X-37. The 5 Orbiters and Buran all flew on the side of the thing. DreamChaser will fly on top of a rocket, but it has yet to.

Great my friend!

Project still alive and kicking

Anariaq

How many shuttle type space planes actually fly on top of a rocket? The only one I know of is the X-37. The 5 Orbiters and Buran all flew on the side of the thing. DreamChaser will fly on top of a rocket, but it has yet to.

...Also BOR-4 and 5 (which flew), Kliper, Hermes, DynaSoar (which never flew but were very advanced designs), and Hope-X or the Chinese CALT project (which are/were early concepts). Early concepts of the US Space Shuttle were also inline.

Actually, most small spaceplane designs use an inline launch architecture, because they use an existing booster and it is safer. Sidemount is more complex to handle and launch and requires a specially designed booster. It has also proven more prone to damaging the orbiter and doesn't cope well with abort situations.

Edited September 5, 2013 by Nibb31
I mean real space planes, not concepts, that have or are about to fly to space.
wow, 42 pages, and the shuttle itself looks great,is there any downloads hidden somewhere in between of them? also you could update the OP with new pictures
No there aren't any Dls anywhere.
Wow, i was reading this topic until i realised the posts were from April 2012...Really liked the MegaShuttle, keep it up!

If and when this mod is released, I won't be attaching the shuttle to a fuel tank or boosters or anything, inline, piggy-back or otherwise. I play sci-fi style, so I use infinite fuel. I'm gonna put some hugely powerful engines in it (I hope that the engines are mounted internally, that's what it looks like in the pics) and fly that thing off the runway by itself!

If and when this mod is released, I won't be attaching the shuttle to a fuel tank or boosters or anything, inline, piggy-back or otherwise. I play sci-fi style, so I use infinite fuel. The engines will be the 2 holes beside the cargo bay. Can make strong version of the engines.
